# Allows you to create your own dynamic keys
# to be called in localization.
# defined_text -> this is it, we're defining the text
# text -> a discrete entry that can be picked to display in loc.
# trigger -> determines if a text entry will be picked or not.
# (The triggers need to be valid for the scope the key is called in
# (eg Root or From.From).)
# localization_key -> points to the localization key
# that'll be used if trigger passes

#########################################
#########################################

#########################################
### MD_countrymissilesview_production ###
#########################################

#########################################
#########################################

### topbar ###

# 	name = topbar_background_icon
# 	text = {
# 		trigger = {
# 			has_dlc = "La Resistance"
# 		}
# 		localization_key = "GFX_topbar_background_extended_missiles_officer_coprs"
# 	}
# 	text = {
# 		trigger = {
# 			NOT = { has_dlc = "La Resistance" }
# 		}
# 		localization_key = "GFX_topbar_background_extended_missiles"
# 	}
# }



#####################################################
#####################################################
### MD_countrymissilesview_production # entry loc ###
#####################################################
#####################################################

### missile_production_gui.xlsx sheet 'scptd loc gui icon code'

defined_text = {
	name = prod_1_icon_gui_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { var_gui_prod_1_missile_inventory_idx = 11 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_generic_ID_11_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {

defined_text = {
	name = prod_7_icon_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { prod_7_display_array^i = 71 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_generic_ID_71_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = USA
			check_variable = { prod_7_display_array^i = 71 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_USA_ID_71_icon"
			}

	name = prod_12_icon_texture

			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { prod_12_display_array^i = 121 }

#######################
### warhead texture ###
#######################

defined_text = {
	name = MD_warhead_selected_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			#check_variable = { var_gui_warhead = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = has_warhead }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_missile_slot_icon_empty"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_gui_nuke = 1 }
		}
		localization_key = MD_conventional_warhead_selected_texture
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_gui_nuke = 2 }
		}
		localization_key = MD_nuclear_warhead_selected_texture
	}
}


### nuclear warheads ###

### nuclear_doctrines.xlsx --> sheet 'warheads textures'

defined_text = {
	name = MD_nuclear_warhead_window_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_warhead_display_array^i = 0 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_nuclear_warhead_generic_ID_0_icon"
	}

		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_warhead_display_array^i = 1 }
		}

### conventional warheads ###

### nuclear_doctrines.xlsx --> sheet 'con warheads textures'


defined_text = {
	name = MD_conventional_warhead_window_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { conventional_warhead_display_array^i = 0 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_conventional_warhead_generic_ID_0_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {

	name = MD_conventional_warhead_selected_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_conventional_warhead = 0 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_conventional_warhead_generic_ID_0_icon"
	}

		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_conventional_warhead = 1 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_conventional_warhead_generic_ID_1_icon"

#######################
### missile texture ###

defined_text = {
	name = MD_missile_type_tech_icon_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			unique_missile_model_texture = yes
		}
		localization_key = MD_missile_type_tech_unique_texture
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_texture = yes }
		}
		localization_key = MD_missile_type_tech_generic_texture
	}
}

			check_variable = { var_gui_missile_type = 72 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_NKO_ID_72_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = PER
			check_variable = { var_gui_missile_type = 72 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_PER_ID_72_icon"
	}
}



###############################
### missile generic texture ###
###############################

### MD_missile_type_window ###

defined_text = {
	name = MD_missile_type_tech_generic_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i = 0 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_missile_slot_icon_empty"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 10 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 20 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_ICBM_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 20 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 30 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_IRBM_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 30 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 40 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_SLBM_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 40 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 50 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_ALCM_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 50 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 60 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_GLCM_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 60 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 70 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_SLCM_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i > 70 }
			check_variable = { global.missile_type_tech_array^i < 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_MD_HSCM_icon"
	}
}

### missile_production_gui.xlsx sheet 'AD&MD win icon code'

defined_text = {
	name = NSAM_type_icon_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_generic_ID_80_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = USA
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_USA_ID_80_icon"
			}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = GER
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_GER_ID_80_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = SOV
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_SOV_ID_80_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = CHI
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_CHI_ID_80_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = ENG
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_ENG_ID_80_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = FRA
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_FRA_ID_80_icon"
	}
	text = {

		localization_key = "GFX_missile_ISR_ID_80_icon"

		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_RAJ_ID_80_icon"
	}

		trigger = {
			original_tag = PAK
			check_variable = { SAM_display_array^i = 80 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_PAK_ID_80_icon"
	}

### missile_production_gui.xlsx sheet 'KILL_RODS gui icon code'

defined_text = {
	name = KILLSAT_selected_icon_texture
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { var_KILLSAT_type = 141 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_generic_ID_141_icon"
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = USA
			check_variable = { var_KILLSAT_type = 141 }
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_missile_USA_ID_141_icon"

### missile_production_gui.xlsx sheet 'sat_payload win icon code'

defined_text = {

		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
